official_title: Decentralized Clinical Trial of Effectiveness of EnergyPoints App to Guide Acupressure Use for Fatigue and Sleep Disturbances in Cancer Survivors
exclusion_criteria:
* recent history of easy bruising or bleeding
* receiving anticoagulants (e.g., warfarin, rivaroxaban)
* previous use of the EnergyPoints app.

Note: The functional ability questions will exclude anyone who is too sick to participate due to life-limiting disease.
